title: What if there were a champion whose abilities generated mana rather than cost mana.
body:
And the champion's passive automatically drains 20 mana a second and converts mana regen into health regen.

And all your abilities scale with current mana, so the longer you are able to keep casting spells, the more mana you will have, the higher the damage from the % current mana.

Buying mana items can improve your "peak potential". Buying cooldown reduction reduces the time it takes to reach that potential.

Buying mana regen items can improve your health regen and staying power in lane.

Clarity can be an interesting spell for "supercharging" yourself quickly.
